rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: These latest cases were detected just days after the Nebraska Department of Agriculture (NDA) announced on March 22 that a commercial flock of 570,000 broiler chickens in Butler County were set to be euthanized after bird flu was detected in the flock.

rationale: The segment reports numbers to be euthanized factually without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
